verses.name: 2 Samuel 4:1
verses.text: And when Saul’s son heard that Abner was dead in Hebron, his hands were feeble, and all the Israelites were troubled.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 4:2
verses.text: And Saul’s son had two men that were captains of bands: the name of the one was Baanah, and the name of the other Rechab, the sons of Rimmon a Beerothite, of the children of Benjamin: (for Beeroth also was reckoned to Benjamin:

verses.name: 2 Samuel 4:3
verses.text: And the Beerothites fled to Gittaim, and were sojourners there until this day.)
